# 5. Chat Guidelines
- Only speak in English. - Do not spam. - Do not advertise. - Do not use Netspeak (i.e. LOL, ROFL, XD, FR). - Hate speech, slurs and bigotry are [color=#ff0000]not allowed.[/color] Words that are closely tied to, or intended to replace/imitate, real life slurs are [color=#ff0000]not allowed.[/color]
